title: Mastery Tokens
body:
Hi LoL community, I have a rather convincing update in my head that could be cool as just a visual for all players to see in your game. 

As we have mastery tokens (2 for level 6 *Purple*) (3 for level 7 *Blue*) Once you hit level 7 you can't get any more rewards for that champion... So what is the point in getting S+ or even an S rank in games. Sure it gives you more points towards your mastery. But why not for every S+ you get some other sort of token where the more you compile *Infinitely* You get a number inside your mastery 7 emote. To let the enemy know that you are a pro on that champion. 

TLDR: Put a number inside of your mastery emote for every S+ you get.
